description: 📉 This is how the raw data looked before cleaning – messy, scattered, and hard to interpret. Real-world data often comes like this and needs strong preprocessing to make sense of it.
⚙️ I use Python to clean, transform, and visualize data with high precision and interactivity — all in real-time for faster decisions.
✅ After cleaning, the dataset is now well-organized and structured — making it ready for deep insights and easy visualizations.
📌 This screen shows the main dashboard layout with KPIs on top and interactive charts below, helping business managers quickly grasp performance.
🔍 Attention to detail is critical, so each insight is supported with high-resolution, clearly labeled visuals that highlight what truly matters.
📊 Each project includes filters to help users drill down into specific data. Also, clean Excel files and a polished project PDF summary are available for download for full transparency and usability.
